column2: "Nyankopɔn a tsetse no ɔnam akwan horow mu mpɛn pii no duaa nkɔnhyɛfo do kasaa kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom no
column4: "nda a odzi ekyir yi mu no ɔnam Ɔba no do akasa akyerɛ hɛn; ɔno na ɔayɛ no adze nyina do ɔdzedzifo
column5: na ɔnam no do so bɔɔ wiadze nyina."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔyɛ n'enyimnyam no ne hyerɛn
column4: na ɔdze no tum asɛm suo ndzɛmba nyina mu. Ɔdze noho hohoor bɔn nyina wiei no
column5: ɔkɛtsenaa Enyimnyam Hen no n'enyimfa wɔ sorsor."

column2: "Hɔ na ɔakrɔn no akyɛn abɔfo dodow dɛ oenya dzin kunyin a ɔkyɛn hɔndze."
"Na abɔfo no mu woana na ɔsee no pɛn dɛ
column4: ndɛ na mawo wo? Na bio
column6: na ɔno so ayɛ me Ɔba?"

column3: onya dze abakan no ba wiadze a
column5: Ma Nyankopɔn n'abɔfoe nyina nkotow no."

column4: w'ahengua wɔ hɔ daa; Na tsenenee poma nye w'ahempoma."

column2: "Adɔ tsenenee na ekyir emumuyɛ: ntsi Nyankopɔn
column4: dze ahosɛpɛw ngo asera wo asen w'etsipɛmfo."

column5: ahyɛse no na etoo asaase ne fapem
column6: Na ɔsor yɛ wo nsaano edwuma;"

column4: ebɔkɔ do dɛmara daa; Na hɔn nyina bosuw dɛ atar;"

column6: Na wo mfe remmba ewiei da."

column2: "Na abɔfo no mu woana ho na ɔaka dɛ
column4: Ma onkodu dɛ medze w'atamfo mebɛyɛ w'ananadzegua?"

column2: "Ana hɔn nyina nnyɛ esunsum asomfo a hɔn a wɔbɛyɛ nkwagye no adzedzifo ntsi wɔsoma hɔn ma wɔbɔsom bi?"
